articles.description: Leon Marchand wins a sensational fourth Olympic gold in the Paris pool, beating Duncan Scott into second place moments after Ben Proud also won silver for Team GB.
articles.title: Olympic swimming: Leon Marchand wins fourth gold, while Duncan Scott and Ben Proud claim silvers

articles.description: The IOC's decision to allow the entry of two athletes, that are said to have failed gender eligibility tests, has proved controversial.
articles.title: Olympics 2024 boxing controversy: What we know and what we don't know

articles.description: Ivan Litvinovich and Viyaleta Bardzilouskaya know they have won Olympic medals, but will not be shown in the official medal table - and this is why.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Individual neutral athletes Ivan Litvinovich & Viyaleta Bardzilouskaya win medals

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Hungarian boxer Anna Luca Hamori says she doesn't "think it's fair" that her next opponent, Imane Khelif, is in the women's category.
articles.title: Imane Khelif competing in women's boxing not fair, says Hungarian opponent

articles.description: France set up an Olympic men's football semi-final with Egypt by beating Argentina 1-0 in the quarter-finals.
articles.title: Olympics football: Ugly scenes as France edge Argentina to set up Egypt semi-final

articles.description: Novak Djokovic will face Carlos Alcaraz in Saturday's men's singles gold-medal match, which will be a repeat of last month's Wimbledon final.
articles.title: Paris Olympics tennis: Novak Djokovic sets up men's final with Carlos Alcaraz

articles.description: Great Britain's Keely Hodgkinson makes a winning start to her Olympic 800m title bid as Joshua Cheptegei claims the first track gold at Paris 2024 in the 10,000m.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Keely Hodgkinson makes winning start in bid for 800m gold

articles.description: Charith Asalanka is the hero for Sri Lanka as they play out a thrilling tie with India in the first one-day international in Colombo.
articles.title: Sri Lanka v India: First ODI in Colombo is tied as Charith Asalanka takes 3-30
